questions.question: In a p stage shift register, what will be the final output delay if the clock period is t?
Where will you give the pulse input in a ripple counter, designed with edge triggered JK flipflop?

answers.a: J and K inputs of one flipflop
answers.c: Clock input of all the flipflops

questions.question: Calculate the maximum counting speed of a 4-bit binary counter designed with flipflops having 25 ns propagation delay
The feedback loop in a counter reduces the number of inputs to reset the counter
A mod-2 counter followed by a mod-5 counter is

answers.d: Same as mod-5 counter followed by a mod-2 counter
